name: 'REPLICA' Afternoon Delight Eau de Toilette with Vanilla & Sandalwood
about: Fragrance Family: Warm & Spicy..Scent Type: Warm & Sweet Gourmands..Key Notes: Madagascar Vanilla, Madeleine Accord, Sandalwood..Fragrance Description: Afternoon Delight is a gourmand, sweet perfume that captures the memory of delectable self-indulgences. The madeleine accord blends with the woody notes of sandalwood, whipped vanilla, and musk to create a rich and creamy unisex fragrance that will evoke your sweetest memories...About the Bottle: Influenced by the look of classic apothecary jars, the luxe perfume bottle carries a cotton label with black ink text and a unique pump wrapped with rope as an homage to the original couture line. The warm fragrance within is echoed by the Polaroid photograph of a madeleine enjoyed outside a Parisian cafe printed on the outside carton...*The natural vanilla used in this fragrance has evolution that can affect colors. Potential color change has no impact on the quality of the scent...About the Fragrance: The signature ingredient in this vanilla perfume, the madeleine accord, transports you to a Parisian cafe, where the uplifting aroma of warm pastries and sugar fills the air. A moment to treat oneself and allow all cares to slip away.
ingredients: Alcohol, Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water/Eau, Benzyl Salicylate, Benzyl Alcohol, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Hexyl Cinnamal, Anise Alcohol, Linalool, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Coumarin, Limonene, Benzyl Benzoate.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Spray perfume in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.

reviews.review_title: Alas.. Empire Victor, Kadlaj saves the day!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately this is a complete let down. If you are looking for a Vanilla Lovers gourmand, then Empire Victor by Khadlaj is going to be the thing this never was. Performance here is horrible and considering the price, Maison Margiela should be ASHAMED of releasing this. You are paying over $150 for something that cost them MAYBE $5 to $10 to make. Keep that in mind when you buy fragrances in 2024. 99% of fragrance houses do NOT use natural ingredients, anymore. Of the 1% who do, only part of the fragrance would include naturals. That includes Middle Eastern, Indie, Designer and Niche perfumery. That's what the biggest cost is, as far as the creation of a fragrance. The next most expensive is the marketing campaign. So, when you go to spend $400 on a Tom Ford, $375 on a PDM, keep in mind that the cost to make those fragrances is not even $20. Usually, its not even HALF THAT. Unless you are buying from a brand like Amouage (who DOES use naturals.) Those $500/bottle brands, they are using the same chemical compounds that the Middle Eastern houses use. When you smell a fragrance and say it smells synthetic that's because IT IS...They all are. With extremely rare exceptions. Oh, they'll lie about it. At least some of them will. But the ones who don't lie, will have no problem doing factory tours, on video. Like AMOUAGE did. (You should watch it. It's wonderful.) Anyway,  I digress.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this as a blind buy because it intrigued me, but I ended up returning it after wrestling between my thoughts on whether I liked it or not. It is NOT a bad fragrance by any means. But, it is definitely not for everyone. I was expecting something more fresh, but although the fragrance is pretty mild, it's mostly nutty with some warm vanilla. It is quite sweet, but not airy. As someone else described it, it's a toasty fragrance. It's worth a shot if you're into gourmands, since although I lean more towards florals, this is definitely a unique gourmand scent I've never smelled before.

reviews.review_text: When I bought I didnu2019t know how to feel about. After about a week I came back to it & loved it. Itu2019s a very creamy, sweet, gourmand, light fragrance. Iu2019ve worn it 3 times & havenu2019t gotten a compliment yet. If I donu2019t get any by the time I finish this 1oz bottle then Iu2019m not purchasing again lol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I do not like gourmands...but this is the first and probably only one I will buy. It's light, warm, comforting and sweet but not in an obnoxious way. It smells like you spent all afternoon in the kitchen and the smell of the white cake you were baking is just lingering slightly on your skin. It dries down to an almost doughy smell on me, almost like bread and not in a synthetic way. I find most designer gourmands are very strong, project like crazy and stay on you forever. This is not one of those, it definitely doesn't last as long or come on as strong but it's very pleasant and not overpowering. Not something I would necessarily recommend blind buying as everyone will feel differently about it. One of my most complimented perfumes from men and women alike.

reviews.review_title: A Beautiful Subtle Gourmand! I Love It!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very Beautiful, Sweet, warm, creamy, woody, feminine, delicate, yummy, sensual, cozy, and comforting. Sweet, warm, creamy, and rich vanilla, the delicate creamy sweetness of whipped cream, warm and delicious madeleine, with the softly sweet and creamy woody scent of sandalwood, and a soft musk. I also get a soft powdered sugar scent that I really love.  Iu2019m really loving Afternoon Delight! This was a blind buy that turned out to be right along the lines of what I was expecting, so Iu2019m really thrilled about that. I think itu2019s very well balancedu2026 not too sweet, too creamy, too woody, or too musky, but theyu2019re all still noticeable. The sandalwood and musk balance out the sweetness nicely and keep it from being too overly sweet. Itu2019s on the light side of being a gourmand scent which is what makes it so special for me.  I think this works well year round, but really shines the most during fall and winter. I donu2019t think itu2019s a unisex fragrance, to me itu2019s feminine. Itu2019s a very easy reach, like an elegant and delicate gourmand scent.  I get great performance with Afternoon Delight. The longevity is really good, it lasts throughout the entire day on me. The projection is nice too, it radiates out about an armu2019s length from me.  This is pretty different from any of the other Replica fragrances I have tried. I have their Memory Box sampler set which includes most of them. I also own the 3.4oz of Beach Walk and travel sprays of By the Fireplace, Autumn Vibes, When the Rain Stops, and now Afternoon Delight too. I loved the travel spray I had ordered to try this one so much that I ended up quickly ordering the 3.4oz too!  For reference, some of my other favorite sweet vanilla/gourmand fragrances include Gold Sugar, Kayali The Wedding Silk Santal, Kayali Vanilla 28, Kayali VCRS, Gucci Flora Gorgeous Orchid, Nest Golden Nectar, Nest Vanilla Bourbon, Phlur Vanilla Skin, Burberry Goddess, Commodity Milk, D&G The Only One Intense, SDJ Summer e Amor, SDJ 62, SDJ 40, VS Vanilla Lace

reviews.review_title: Bakery but make it a perfume
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I waited until I could smell this in store bc of the polarizing reviews. It's sweet and smells like a bakery but without smelling like a candle or air freshner. It still has hints of other things that make it a perfume. I tested it on my skin then left to run an errand - I had to pick up a cake and cookies from a bakery then stop at UPS and Fedex. It really highlighted how realistic bakery it smelled. When I went in UPS/Fedex I kept thinking I could smell the cake or cookies and then realized it was the perfume. I love it. It's not over kill. It's perfect. It's what I hoped Vanilla S*x would be. I realized I wanted Birthday s*x not Vanilla s*x lol. This delivers. This is birthday cake in a bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful delicate gourmand. It smells like sugar cookies, sandalwood, and musk. There is a bit of a lactonic note. It's more like brown butter than whipped cream or milk.  My only issue is this is a ridiculously expensive EDT. The staying power is okay. The sillage is fair. The fragrance isn't mind blowing unique.  I would never pay full price for this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought it online just off of the scent description. Glad I took the gamble, it's such a unique and layered scent. It's sweet but not too sweet, musky, nutty, and a hint of caramel and amber. Perfect fall smell if you want to smell like dessert but for sexy adults feeling themselves. Gives me a little pep in my step

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: amazing! iu2019m normally not a fall fragrance person because of the usual scent profiles- but i LOVE this perfume! it smells like warm vanilla and cinnamon pastries.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am literally a huge fan of these REPLICA perfumes by Maison Margiela for one reason and  itu2019s that they are very authentic and unique perfumes that always bring back such lovely memories! This one in particular for me is the inspiration of fall, the transition to a new season and not just about the weather but also the memories with friends, bonfires, the sweet scent of vanilla, outfits with boots and so much more! I love the design of the bottle and even though I have never been to a Parisian Cafe but, I know that this would be a fragrance that I would definitely wear on that day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Margiela has its own touch to the fragrances and this one has it too, but it is more of a sweet gourmand-ish vibe. This is my third favorite from Maison Margiela. I love that it opens up like warm pastries and vanilla, stays on for a few hours (3-5 in my case). If you want to smell like Parisian pastry, with the accord of vanilla and madeleine, this one is for you.

The mix u043ef bright florals and soft musk creates a fun and flirty vibe that's perfect for everyday adventures. I love how u0456tufeff staysufeff light and airy throughout the day. Definitelyufeff would recommend this perfume tu043e anyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Please do not expect the perfect vanilla gourmand from this, it's more like a musky sweet scent with a prominent sandalwood. I can tell many people will be disappointed by this.

reviews.review_title: It's Giving Whispers In The Library BUT Sweeter!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful scent for vanilla lovers AND gives me a sweeter version of Whispers In The Library!!!! I can smell the vanilla and sandalwood easily...plus it's musky with a hint of a sweet cream which I love. This is definitely one of my favorite fragrances from Maison Margiela. It's one of those scents that reminds me of the fall-time, winter and being curled up in a cozy blanket drinking hot cocoa.  If you're a lover of warm gourmand scents that is musky, sweet but not too strong...you will probably love this scent.

reviews.review_title: Way Too Milky, Not Enough Vanilla
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited for Afternoon Delight, especially after hearing that it was supposed to smell like a madeleine. I was expecting lots and lots of vanilla, and that is what I got on first spray, almost like pure vanilla extract. However after about two seconds, it settled into a super milky scent, like slightly spoiled unsweetened heavy cream. It was pretty unbearable, but after a few hours, the base notes finally came in and transformed the fragrance into a vanilla musk scent, which I absolutely loved. I sadly had to return; I couldn't justify dealing with the heavy cream notes for the majority of the wear, and the vanilla musk at the end didn't last long enough or project very well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! It is packaged beautifully and smells so good. Great for any occasion. Highly Recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A resounding NO. From what I could smell before dispensing the fragrance on paper, I was worried. Tested it on paper (not on myself, first) and I was repulsed. (I knew if I didn't like it on paper, I would not like it on me!)This smells terrible, end story. It's unfortunate because the mention of vanilla is what made me purchase it blindly. I own a few of Maison Margiela's other fragrances that I love! However, this one, did not deliver whatsoever. Highly suggest smelling it in person before buying it, if possible. Purchased with my own money and this was an immediate Return for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Replica Afternoon Delight by Maison Margiela is a radiant and uplifting scent that captures the essence of a warm afternoon. This fragrance is a masterful blend of freshness and sensuality. Not overwhelming. Perfect for daytime wear, itu2019s a beautiful and evocative scent thatu2019s sure to delight. This fragrance will also be perfect for fall season and Winter

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: The most delightful and yummy scented fragrance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Maison Margiela. I have nothing but good things to say about this delightfully smelling perfume. Truly is such a very delectable sense that envelops my nose each time that I spray it onto myself. I love how it reminds me of a bakery and all the wonderful treats that you would smell as soon as you enter the shop. The smell is definitely one of a kind and I really enjoy spraying it on myself because it just lightens up my mood and honestly makes me crave some sweets. Each time I have sprayed this on to myself I had to go and get myself a little treat because of how much this makes me crave. The scent also does last for quite some time and even when long hours have passed you can still smell a hint of the vanilla scent on yourself or on your clothing. I love how I also don't have to spray so much for the scent to actually be present and I enjoy not having to spray myself again after just a few hours. I get the most out of this fragrance in the same with its minimalistic but very beautiful bottle that it is in. I honestly believe this fragrance was well thought out and it has definitely become a staple throughout the summer and I can't wait to bring it in to the Fall season now. Overall I am going to be enjoying this perfume for quite some time and I know for once I am definitely going to finish it and have to buy another one immediately once it's done.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Margiela's Replica Afternoon Delight from the first spray made me realize that I am officially a vanilla note kind of girl. This has been my go-to fragrance so much that I had to ease up because it literally can be worn all day, all night. It pairs nicely with a lot of my other fragrances and in my opinion can be worn year round! 10 out of 10 recommend!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this scent!! Maison Margiela 'REPLICA' Afternoon Delight Eau de Toilette with Vanilla & Sandalwood. Fragrance description: Afternoon Delight Eau de Toilette captures a moment of self-indulgence, transporting you to a Parisian cafe where the uplifting aroma of warm madeleines fills the air. This sweet yet light, ambery gourmand unisex fragrance evokes moments of joyful escapism. Fragrance Family: Warm & Cozy. Key Notes: Madeline Accord, Sandalwood, Madagascar Vanilla. This perfume smells incredible! The packaging was just beautiful and sprays beautifully on the skin. This has a beautiful intense creamy vanilla burst right out the gate, she then has sweetness of madeleine cookies and warm sandalwood on dry down.  Itu2019s smells cozy yet sweet itu2019s definitely a really good smell, nothing too exaggerating! Iu2019ve had so many compliments on how amazing I smell and people always ask what perfume. Definitely a must have in your collection. I DEFINITELY recommend. You will NOT be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Maison Margielau2019s *Afternoon Delight* is that effortless scent you throw on when you want to feel good without trying too hard. Itu2019s fresh, a bit floral, and has a warm finish that sticks around just enough. Super easy to wear and perfect for relaxed days.

DO NOT BLIND BUY!! PLEASEEE test on skin because it pulls very differently on people.  So anyways I blind bought a full size and actually ended up really liking it on ME. The incentivized reviews are so over the top it makes me want to return this. On ME this smells like powdered sugar, milky, super creamy, pastry like but light enough to somewhat mimic a madeleine sponge. Not sure where that is coming from which is why this is not blind buy safe. Also, if you just smell the cap it smells like straight sandalwood.   For context here are some of my other favorites from sephora: commodity milk expressive, replica matcha meditation, kilian princess, nette the vanille, burberry her elixir.

I'm looking forward to wearing this more in the fall when the weather starts getting cooler. I do like it and would recommend it, but for the price point it could be more impressive.

reviews.review_title: BE CAREFUL, YOU DIDN'T GET THIS FOR FREE
reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's a little frustrating that before the fragrance is even launched, the product is flooded with people who were given the product for free and then given a script of words/phrases to use to describe and review the product. (really, that many people think it reminds them of a cafe in Paris?) When promised cookie and vanilla, gourmand lovers are going to be looking for just that. If you were to ask me honestly what I think it smells like, I'd say baby wipes/diapers with powdered sugar on it. It has that same diaper smell that Phlur-Not Your Baby has- minus the mimosa urine smell. It's VERY light. Nothing thick or heavy at all. I'd call it a daytime workplace fragrance, as it's so light I have to be an inch away from my skin to smell it. With all of the heavy and photo-realistic gourmands that are out there right now, I'd say this is sure to disappoint some blind buyers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Love BUT do NOT blind buy based off reviews.
reviews.review_text: OK, Iu2019ve been on a perfume kick so I blind bought this because I always love vanilla scents and I LOVE beach walk. Iu2019ve noticed with replica they always sound good on paper/from other people but never smell how Iu2019d imagine on my own skin. Basically I knew there was a risk here. Anyway, itu2019s not bad. Itu2019s just literally not what they describe like at all. And I think the influencer reviews are very frustrating because I feel a lot of these people are not very into perfume and throw around around terms that they donu2019t understand. This is not a gourmand like at all. Itu2019s not warm or spicy at all. I think itu2019s comical people are even saying that. And thatu2019s why Iu2019m taking some stars off because these reviews are not helpful. ANYWAY, to me personally itu2019s giving, Iu2019m a very clean person who just took a shower and I also have vanilla on. Basically it feels like a very fresh vanilla. I actually do really like it and Iu2019m getting some whiffs of sweetness, but also freshness from the sandalwood. If you want a clean light vanilla scent without it being overly gourmand, then this is definitely for you. But please just donu2019t trust the reviews from the people who receive the product for free because I donu2019t really think they know what terms theyu2019re throwing around.

reviews.review_text: Maison Margiela's 'REPLICA' Afternoon Delight Eau de Toilette is a delightful fragrance that captures the essence of a tranquil afternoon basking in the sun. The composition beautifully blends creamy vanilla with the warm, earthy notes of sandalwood, creating a lush, comforting aroma that feels both inviting and elegant.   As the fragrance unfolds, you experience a sense of serenity that evokes images of lounging in a serene garden, surrounded by blooming flowers and warm sunlight. The longevity is impressive, ensuring that the comforting scent lingers throughout the day without becoming overpowering.   Overall, Afternoon Delight is a versatile fragrance suitable for both casual and special occasions, making it an excellent addition to any perfume collection. Its unique blend of sweetness and warmth creates a signature scent that leaves a lasting impression. Perfect for those who appreciate a soothing and cozy olfactory experience.
